<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a cargo container of a unit's backpack.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[backpackContainer]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - a soldier

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - cargo container or [[objNull]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[backpackContainer]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>1a5f7900# 163944: backpack_fast.p3d</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[getMagazineCargo]] [[backpackContainer]] [[player]];</code>

<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>[
	[
		"APERSBoundingMine_Range_Mag",
		"ClaymoreDirectionalMine_Remote_Mag",
		"SLAMDirectionalMine_Wire_Mag",
		"DemoCharge_Remote_Mag"
	],[

		2,

		1
	]
]</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>([[backpackContainer]] [[player]]) [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[weapons]] [[player]] [[select]] 0,1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]], [[uniformContainer]], [[vestContainer]], [[everyContainer]]

<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In <template><title>arma3</title></template> ver 1.16, we can use either [[backpackContainer]] or [[unitBackpack]] at present since both of them enjoy same operand type and return value.
